q:
You are required to create a master page that implements a specific property called MyProp of datatype bool and can be used in content pages to control the behavior of the master page. Which of the following ASP.NET codes will you use to complete this task?
Options:

  1. <%@ MasterType ="~/SampleWebsite.Master" %>
Master.MyProp = false; 
  2. <%@ MasterType VirtualPath="~/SampleWebsite.Master" %>
Master.MyProp = false; 
  3. <%@ MasterType VirtualPath="~/SampleWebsite.Master" %>
MasterType.MyProp = false; 
  4. None of these
